name: Roary the Racing Car
description:
Back of Case - Nintendo DS (UK) (from Ad Blurbs)

Start your engines...Get ready to race!

Zoom around Silver Hatch with Roary the Racing Car, Big Chris and friends and play entertaining puzzle games and brain-teasing activities on every corner of the race track!

15 puzzles & games including: Roary's Race, Musical Mayhem, Light ['Em Up Roary, Cici's Track Challenge, Catch Flash, Big Christine's Tyre Challenge, Molecom Forgets plus many more!
  • Encourages the development of memory, logic, problem-solving and creative skills
  • 3 levels - easy, medium and hard to suit all ages
  • Pole position medal reward system to keep young children motivated
  • Features new characters from Series 2
